Summary: orange in color glowing fast not a sound
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Raytown
There was one other sighting in Raytown on or around July 3rd 2010
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailswife and i had just pulled into parking lot at our apartment building after eating dinner and getting some fireworks. was very quite out . as we unloaded the car we looked up and in the distance wittnessed a football shaped object glowing an orangeish red color. at first we thought is was some sort of fire work but it hovored there for a minute then moved off to the north behind the tree line without a sound and without exploding. then it circled back around after a minute or so. it continued to hover for a few seconds then in the blink of an eye it was gone just zipped off .went to take a phone on cell phone but was so far away that nothing was captured . think that is everything have not seen anything sense but would like to know what we did see
